ModMetaData.name: Prosthetics and Organs by Kkokoros!
ModMetaData.author: Kkokoros
ModMetaData.description:
For more info check out the github page :D Adds the ability to craft tons of prostheses and artificial organs.
Adds 5 Tiers of artificial prosthetics and organs: T0: Wooden Replacements T1: Artificial Replacements T2: Bionic Replacements T3: Advanced Bionic Replacements T4: Ultra Bionic Replacements
Includes Replacements for: Shoulder-arms(shoulders),Legs,Eyes,Ears,Nose,Jaw,Spine,Pelvis,Neck, Ribcage(Nanomachines),Sternum (Medical, Drugged, Adrenaline, Painkiller), Brain,Lungs,Kidneys,Heart,Stomach,liver. Also includes 2 types of Exosuits.
Adds compatibility to other mods like: -Dubs Bad Hygiene(bladder,hygiene enhancer) -Organs Expanded by Kkokoros (spleen, pancreas, gallbladder)
Adds compatibility to Xeno mods like: -Apini Playable Race, Continued! (apini stuff) -Bun Race (tail) -Horan, The tiny tiger race (tail) -Kiiro Race (tail) -Maru Race (tail) -Nyaron race (tail) -Rabbie The Moonrabbit race (tail) -Kurin HAR Edition (tail,ear) -Naki Race HAR Edition (tail,ear) -Silkiera Race (tail,ear) -NewRatkinPlus (tail,ear) -Moyo-From the depth(tail)
Adds orbital Trader that sells Kkokorosorgans Items.
Languages added: -English -Polish
Special thanks to these people for help :D Textures | Moonlight C# code | WiiZoo
you can enable or disable the eyes textures in options
If you see any errors, issues, what I should rebalance or any mods that need compatibilities. let me know in the comments.
